players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I am shocked Alice is dead. We need to be careful and share info — who can confirm their whereabouts last night?"
You: "I investigated Charlie last night — they're the mafioso. We should vote to arrest Charlie now."
Diana: "Bob, that’s a big claim. Can you share what led you to investigate Charlie and what you learned exactly?"

Charlie: "I didn't do it — Bob's accusation is suspiciously convenient. Bob, why would you investigate me first thing? That looks like a setup to frame me after the killer struck. Diana, Bob hasn't explained his method or timing; we should ask for specifics before voting."
You: "I investigated Charlie last night and my investigation returned 'mafioso.' I have no incentive to lie — arresting Charlie is the only way to stop more deaths."

Diana: "Bob, your claim is decisive but needs detail. Charlie raises a good point — tell us what time you investigated, who you spoke to (if anyone), and whether your result could be a false positive. Charlie, any alibi?"
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
